00057 #ifndef STRING_SYMBOL_H
00058 #define STRING_SYMBOL_H
00059 
00060 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00061 #include <config.h>
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * STRING symbol table structures and prototypes
00065  */
00066 typedef struct STRING_Symbol
00067 {
00068   char *name;                   /* Name of symbol */
00069   unsigned int hash_val;        /* Hashed value of name */
00070   void *data;                   /* Data struct pointed to */
00071   struct STRING_Symbol_Table *table;    /* For deletion of symbol */
00072   struct STRING_Symbol *next_hash;      /* For table's hash table */
00073   struct STRING_Symbol *prev_hash;
00074   struct STRING_Symbol *next_symbol;    /* For table's contents list */
00075   struct STRING_Symbol *prev_symbol;
00076 }
00077 STRING_Symbol;
00078 
00079 typedef struct STRING_Symbol_Table
00080 {
00081   char *name;                   /* For error messages */
00082   STRING_Symbol **hash;         /* Array of size hash_size */
00083   int hash_size;                /* Must be power of 2 */
00084   int hash_mask;                /* AND mask, (hash_size - 1) */
00085   int resize_size;              /* When reached, resize hash table */
00086   STRING_Symbol *head_symbol;   /* Contents list */
00087   STRING_Symbol *tail_symbol;
00088   int symbol_count;
00089 }
00090 STRING_Symbol_Table;
00091 
00092 #ifdef __cplusplus
00093 extern "C"
00094 {
00095 #endif
00096 
00097   extern STRING_Symbol_Table *STRING_new_symbol_table (char *name,
00098                                                        int expected_size);
00099   extern void STRING_delete_symbol_table (STRING_Symbol_Table * table,
00100                                           void (*free_routine) (void *));
00101   extern STRING_Symbol *STRING_add_symbol (STRING_Symbol_Table * table,
00102                                            char *name, void *data);
00103   extern STRING_Symbol *STRING_find_symbol (STRING_Symbol_Table * table,
00104                                             char *name);
00105   extern void *STRING_find_symbol_data (STRING_Symbol_Table * table,
00106                                         char *name);
00107   extern void STRING_delete_symbol (STRING_Symbol * symbol,
00108                                     void (*free_routine) (void *));
00109 
00110 /* For debugging hashing function only */
00111   extern void STRING_print_symbol_table_hash (FILE * out,
00112                                               STRING_Symbol_Table * table);
00113 
00114 #ifdef __cplusplus
00115 }
00116 #endif
00117 
00118 #endif
